source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic time-lapse video of a park with a large floral clock and a white stupa. The camera glides forward along a brick path, moving closer to the clock and the stupa in the background. The sped-up motion of people walking around the park indicates this is a time-lapse or hyper-lapse shot.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic time-lapse video of a park with a large floral clock and a white stupa. The camera glides forward along a brick path, moving closer to the clock and the stupa in the background.
